20Stakeholder groups
We maintain a fluid and transparent relationship with our stakeholders to 
stay abreast of their expectations and concerns and translate them into 
information of strategic value for the management of our business. We 
carried out an internal process to identify and select our stakeholders 
based on the criteria of interaction and impact on the business.
In November, we held a closing meeting of the year of sustainability 
in our offices in Buenos Aires, which was attended by more than 100 
representatives of our stakeholders. In the event, we share with them the 
spotlights of our strategy, the efforts made and the results achieved.
